Articles.Content:
As The Title says, I have updated Macey Deans SW Battlecruiser to 1.2, In the process I have replaced the outdated weapons, and added utility's essential to modern KSP military craft without overhauling the original ascetic design, so here you go     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rpoRtY1EkCQ  

Craft file will be released tomorrow, just re-checking everything at this point in time
